name: Quercetin
description: Flavonoid with senolytic, anti-inflammatory, and antiviral properties. Part of the dasatinib + quercetin senolytic cocktail studied at Mayo Clinic. Also used standalone for immune support, histamine management, and general anti-inflammatory benefits.

dosage.notes: Poor bioavailability — use phytosome or liposomal form. As senolytic: 1000mg for 3 days monthly. As daily supplement: 500mg. Zinc ionophore — take with zinc for immune support.

keyFindings: Dasatinib + Quercetin cleared senescent cells in human clinical trial (Mayo Clinic)
Reduced upper respiratory infections in athletes (meta-analysis)
Potent zinc ionophore — enhances intracellular zinc for antiviral activity
